ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat & Regeants
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve heard that Melatite (not to be confused with Malachite) is a regeant (can t verify). I was wondering if it could be bought there as well? I ve been
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "CC" <cc@...>
>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Making Plat
>Date: Tue, 9 Nov 1999 10:17:05 -0600
>
>Bat wings, along with other components that are required for various
>spells,
>can be purchased for sure in the Erudin Mage Tower. I usually drop in
>there
>with my druid to pick up a ton of fish scales (for underwater breathing)
>and
>cat's eye agate (for my pure casting friends who need it for shielding
>spells). I honestly have found every regeant anyone has ever needed in
>that
>place!
>
>Money at earlier levels is always a little tough to get. Once you hit
>about
>20-25, the mobs you're fighting will start to drop plat on a regular basis.
>I think one of the richest mobs in the game has to be Hill Giants so far,
>usually carrying between 10 and 70 plat (which auto-splits nicely in a big
>group). Now I am sure Vox and Nagafen might be loaded too, but they are
>usually bursting with really cool weapons and other rare items. =)
>
>-CC (aka Haukha, 35th level Halfling Druid, Veeshan)
>


I've heard that Melatite (not to be confused with Malachite) is a regeant
(can't verify). I was wondering if it could be bought there as well? I've
been camping Sol A for it and have thus been unable to obtain any.
